channel.title: Need a yell command
channel.description:
I need it for rich's newest version of RichScape. I tried adding a normal one, but I got errors. I'll Rep++ you if you can make me a working one.
p1z g1v3 m3h on3 cuz i r nub lolz,,, X Screech.

item.title: Need a yell command
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

Well… Thanks `Rich, I feel like an ass… Nice source by the way.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2009, 08:16:25 pm[/size][hr]I still don’t get it. I’m player rights 3 and i cant do ::yell.

Read full topic

It already has one for characters with owner privileges.

item.title: Need a yell command
item.dc:creator: @demonnd demonnd
item.description:
@demonnd wrote:

[code] } else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {

        command.substring(5).replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).replaceAll("servegame", "imgay");
        command.substring(5).trim();

        if (muted == 1) {
            sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!");
        } else {
            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " - "
                    + command.substring(5);[/code]

Read full topic
